list_translation_mean.translate_mean: nơi trình diển của nam giới

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a person who produces or presents shows as a profession, especially the proprietor, manager, or MC of a circus, fair, or other variety show.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: showmen inveigled the masses into circuses, fairgrounds, peep shows, theaters
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Showmen xác nhận khối lượng vào rạp xiếc, hội chợ, chương trình Peep, rạp chiếu phim
